mapper.insert: INSERT INTO banner ( banner_no, origin_name, stored_name, file_type ) VALUES ( banner_seq.nextval, #{originName}, #{storedName}, #{fileType} )
mapper.select: SELECT banner_no, origin_name, stored_name, file_type FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM banner ORDER BY banner_no DESC ) B ) WHERE rnum <= 3
